system.description: This spell functions like lesser planar ally, except you may call a single creature of 12 HD or less, or two creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 12. The creatures agree to help you and request your return payment together. You must offer payment; the creature(s) may accept or refuse. Tasks that endanger them or conflict with their nature require greater payment or may be refused.
system.target: One or two called elementals or outsiders, totaling no more than 12 HD, no more than 30 ft. apart
